## Description {#details}

A helper containing a list of offsets computed for a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a>.

Ideally this list should be strictly ascending, but we ensure that only when we actually translate the list of offsets to a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/aapointerinfo/rangelist">RangeList</a>.

Definition at line 5800 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.

### merge() {#af3981da39f7d4904f07fa2c456a06448}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::AAPointerInfo::OffsetInfo::merge (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/aapointerinfo/offsetinfo">OffsetInfo</a> &amp; R)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Copy offsets from <code>R</code> into the current list.

Ideally all lists should be strictly ascending, but we defer that to the actual use of the list. So we just blindly append here.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l05841">5841</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
